page.title: 10LIFE ON A FARM, NESSCLIFFE
page.content: Our farm is quite small, about 3 acres so we only have four cows. There are four sheds where the calves go. The cows go in when it is time for the calves to have their milk. We have forty lambs, 25 ewes and one ram. Our sheep dog is not trained to round the sheep so he is tied up to a chain. Each year the sheep go to be sheared and dipped. Our class went to see the shearing. By the gate going into the field there is a big oak tree. It's where I play on my rope ladder. It's possible to climb up the tree and climb down the rope ladder.
